Yeah, PE of 300 . . . the phrase of the day is 'bag holder' - from investopedia What Is a Bag Holder?A bag holder is an informal term used to describe an investor who holds a position in a security that decreases in value until it descends into worthlessness. In most cases, the bag holder stubbornly retains their holding for an extended period, during which time the value of the investment goes to zero.
